bug.short_desc: several qx.test.ui.Window tests fail with Opera 10.63

long_desc.thetext:
qx.test.ui.Window:testActiveWindowBeforeWindowOpened Error message is: : Expected value to be null but found qx.ui.window.Window[undefined]! qx.test.ui.Window:testActiveWindowAfterWindowClosed Error message is: : Expected value to be null but found qx.ui.window.Window[415]! qx.test.ui.Window:testActiveWindowAfterRemovingOpenedWindow Error message is: : Expected value to be null but found qx.ui.window.Window[415]! qx.test.ui.Window:testActiveWindowAfterRemovingAllWindows Error message is: : Expected value to be null but found qx.ui.window.Window[650]!
These test only fail with 1.2.1 and are working with the 1.3-devel. They even fail when run separately.
I am running Opera 10.63 on Windows 7 x64.
Tristan, please see if this could easily be backported for 1.2.2 (or already was).

It appears this has already been fixed in branch_1_2_x.
Could reproduce on tags/release_1_2_1 with Opera 10.63/Mac, Opera 10.10/Mac, Opera 10.63/Win7, Chrome/Mac.
Could NOT reproduce on branch_1_2_x with Opera 10.63/Mac, Opera 10.10/Mac, Opera 10.63/Win7, Chrome/Mac.
